unnormalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot in the Indian Auto Scene?
normalised: ## New Wheels Alert! What's Hot in the Indian Auto Scene?

unnormalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! It's your boy, Rohan, back with the lowdown on all the latest vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. Forget your chai breaks, you need to be clued in!
normalised: Namaste, auto enthusiasts! It's your boy, Rohan, back with the lowdown on all the latest vehicle launches happening right here in Bharat. Forget your chai breaks, you need to be clued in!

unnormalised: First up, Tata Motors just dropped the Altroz EV (finally!). Rumours were flying around since Auto Expo 2020, and now it's real! Expecting a range of around 350 km and a starting price competitive with the Nexon EV. Think sustainable driving, Mumbai style!
normalised: First up, Tata Motors just dropped the Altroz E V (finally!). Rumours were flying around since Auto Expo two thousand and twenty, and now it's real! Expecting a range of around three hundred and fifty kilometer and a starting price competitive with the Nexon E V. Think sustainable driving, Mumbai style!

unnormalised: Then there's Mahindra, teasing us relentlessly with the Thar 5-door. Spotted testing near Nashik, it looks beefier and ready for some serious off-roading in Rajasthan. Perfect for tackling those sand dunes! They’re also reportedly working on an all-electric XUV700, dubbed the XUV.e8. Watch out, Tesla!
normalised: Then there's Mahindra, teasing us relentlessly with the Thar five door. Spotted testing near Nashik, it looks beefier and ready for some serious off-roading in Rajasthan. Perfect for tackling those sand dunes! They’re also reportedly working on an all-electric X U V seven hundred, dubbed the X U V dot e eight. Watch out, Tesla!

unnormalised: Maruti Suzuki isn't sitting still either. The new-gen Swift is supposedly launching before Diwali. Expect a facelift and maybe even a stronger hybrid engine. Perfect for zipping through Bangalore traffic.
normalised: Maruti Suzuki isn't sitting still either. The new-gen Swift is supposedly launching before Diwali. Expect a facelift and maybe even a stronger hybrid engine. Perfect for zipping through Bangalore traffic.

unnormalised: Let's not forget the premium segment. Mercedes-Benz has unveiled its new EQS SUV, promising unparalleled luxury and tech. Dr. Sharma from IIT Madras gave it a thumbs up for its advanced battery tech during a recent webinar. Very impressive!
normalised: Let's not forget the premium segment. Mercedes-Benz has unveiled its new E Q S S U V, promising unparalleled luxury and tech. Doctor Sharma from I I T Madras gave it a thumbs up for its advanced battery tech during a recent webinar. Very impressive!

unnormalised: Beyond cars, several two-wheeler companies are getting into the EV game. Ather Energy is expanding its charging grid nationwide, aiming for 1000+ stations by the end of the year. And Hero MotoCorp is revamping its factories with a massive investment to increase EV production.
normalised: Beyond cars, several two-wheeler companies are getting into the E V game. Ather Energy is expanding its charging grid nationwide, aiming for one thousand plus stations by the end of the year. And Hero MotoCorp is revamping its factories with a massive investment to increase E V production.

unnormalised: Keep your eyes peeled for more updates, and tell me in the comments – which launch are you most excited about? And finally, a new dealership just opened up on MG Road, with a massive showroom measuring 5,000 sq ft. Go check it out! Cars starting from Rs. 8 Lakh.
normalised: Keep your eyes peeled for more updates, and tell me in the comments – which launch are you most excited about? And finally, a new dealership just opened up on M G Road, with a massive showroom measuring five thousand square feet. Go check it out! Cars starting from rupees eight lakh.
